mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (CAT_SQ, CAT_CONTENT, CAT_ST, CAT_GB_SQ) VALUES (CATEGORY_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{catContent}, #{catSt}, TO_NUMBER(#{catGbSq}))
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE CAT_SQ = TO_NUMBER(#{catSq})

SELECT count(*) totCnt FROM CATEGORY
AND CAT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM CATEGORY A, CATEGORY_GB B WHERE A.CAT_GB_SQ = B.CAT_GB_SQ
AND B.BOARD_GB_SQ = TO_NUMBER(#{boardGbSq})
